channel.title: How do i change my hostname?
channel.description:
Iv been banned off swiftirc unfairly. Does anyone know how i can change my hostname without having to buy a new internet connection?
This may seem like an idiotic question but im an idiot so try to dum ur answer down plz.
Thanks

item.description:
@AnthraX_Leader wrote:

hostname lol that is an idiotic question what the hell is a hostname lol all you have to do is change your ip do you have dsl aol cable etc?
